column4: anyone know why when ubuntu 9.10 installs next to xp it installs in a minimum partition -- like 200mb -- I have tried this a few times - would expect it to give the ubuntu partition more space
it will allow me to manually resize the xp space?
you mean, installed in a directory in the XP partition?

side by side.... I gather you mean partitions wise.... well... I do a 'manual' on the partitions to install to, :|  by default it trires to usethe whole HD space IIRC, I have it on a 10gbs partition, so
